attributes.action: Safer Method Of Payment To Ensure Child Maintenance Get Spent On the Child!
attributes.background: I think a payment card Should be in place so it allows certain items to be purchased for the child or a report of the transactions sent to the Child maintenance service to prove the money is being spent on the appropriate needs of the child.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for the introduce of a child maintenance card that allows only certain items to be purchased.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
